text: so I've had the iPhone 6s plus for over
a year now
and I am very happy I did not switch to
the iPhone 7 here's why let's start off
with the design this iPhone 6s plus
looks identical to the iPhone 7 plus
there are some fancy new colors for the
iPhone 7 and 7 plus which all look very
very nice however my preference has
always been the silver and white color
option so so the iPhone 7 and some plus
as Apple's new a10 chip which is very
good in fast and speedy and night and
the iPhone 6s plus has the Apple day 9
chip which is still very good in speedy

there the iPhone 7 Series has a slightly

haven't found myself craving for a

problem
the new home button on the iPhone 7 and

much
it's a capacitive button which means
it's no longer really a plan you press
down so it just registers by touch it's
nice but not worth the eight hundred

fancy jeweler's camera which has a nice
feature called

has a headphone jack as you might know
the iPhone 7 in Simon plots do not have

I do use bluetooth headphones as my

I mean dongles get lost they cost more

there's just angle there's the most in

rumors about this fancy new iPhone but
